newsArray.title: Ex-Premier League stars want Gallagher probed over alleged racism
creator: Abiodun Adewale
newsArray.description: Retired Nigerian players who played in the English Premier League have asked the English FA to look into allegations of racism against Chelsea’s Conor Gallagher after the midfielder was seen snubbing a young black boy in the tunnel before their EPL match against Burnley at the Stamford Bridge last Saturday, Saturday PUNCH reports.
